Author: AtmoOmen
Name: Currency Tracker
Description:
Track changes of currencies and record them as Transactions with Time, Change, Location and Note!

Also allow you to query, export, add custom currencies tracker and view visualized data.
Changelog:
- Improve recording features related to Gold Sacuer.
- Fixed bug in writing incorrect location for quest related transactions.
- Add Record Trade Target feature.
- Modified some Trackers' code logic.
